creator: Matrixport
descriptionHtml:
Bit.com is a secure and high-performance derivative exchange launched by Matrixport, an integrated financial services firm and household name in crypto.

Bit.com offers crypto perpetual swaps and option trading, currently available for BTC, ETH and BCH. Among these, Bitcoin Cash option trading on Bit.com is the first of its kind in the industry.

Bit.com was built with institutional-grade security and risk management features to ensure a superior trading experience leveraging best-in-class liquidity.

App Features:
- Perpetual Swaps
- Futures
- Options
- Spot Conversion (coming soon)

Advantages of our Products:

- Liquidity
Top liquidity provided by tier-one market makers globally.

- 50x Leverage
Trade Futures with up to 50x leverage and Options with up to 10x leverage.

- User Protection
Best-in-class insurance fund and incremental liquidation mechanism.

- Security
Safeguarded by qualified custodian Cactus Custody, global setup and cutting-edge custodian infrastructure.
descriptionShort: Leading High Performance Cryptocurrency Derivatives Exchange

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Bit.com offers crypto perpetual swaps and option trading, currently available for BTC, ETH and BCH. Among these, Bitcoin Cash option trading on Bit.com is the first of its kind in the industry.
Bit.com was built with institutional-grade security and risk management features to ensure a superior trading experience leveraging best-in-class liquidity.
App Features:
- Perpetual Swaps
- Futures
- Options

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: - Significant improvements on Kline chart to help traders to catch technical signals easily. - Refinements on option trading include: Support option PnL sharing poster Add close position guidance on instrument position detail page - Refinements on futures trading include: Support trigger order Add order type explanation - Other features: Introduce Investor Risk Assessment process Display position PnL directly on the home page Hide certain features for sub-account - Bug fixes.

creator: Matrixport Technologies Ltd
descriptionHtml:
Bit.com is a secure and high-performance derivative exchange launched by Matrixport, an integrated financial services firm and household name in crypto.

Bit.com offers crypto perpetual swaps and option trading, currently available for BTC, ETH and BCH. Among these, Bitcoin Cash option trading on Bit.com is the first of its kind in the industry.

Bit.com was built with institutional-grade security and risk management features to ensure a superior trading experience leveraging best-in-class liquidity.

App Features:
- Perpetual Swaps
- Futures
- Options
- Spot Conversion (coming soon)

Advantages of our Products:

- Liquidity
Top liquidity provided by tier-one market makers globally.

- 50x Leverage
Trade Futures with up to 50x leverage and Options with up to 10x leverage.

- User Protection
Best-in-class insurance fund and incremental liquidation mechanism.

- Security
Safeguarded by qualified custodian Cactus Custody, global setup and cutting-edge custodian infrastructure.
descriptionShort: Leading High Performance Cryptocurrency Derivatives Exchange

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: This release includes bug fixes and performance improvements.

title:
BIT
2.0.4

creator: BIT Technologies Holding Company
descriptionHtml:
bit.com is a global cryptocurrency exchange founded in 2020, operating under the premium domain bit.com. Headquartered in Dubai, we have teams across multiple countries and regions, providing trusted services to users worldwide. Our core offerings include spot and perpetual trading, C2C cloud mining, and GoRich — an on-chain crypto trading platform. We are committed to building a one-stop digital asset investment platform that’s simple to use, secure, and accessible to everyone.
Spot & Perpetual Trading
bit.com offers a clean and intuitive trading interface for both spot and perpetual contracts. Whether you're new to crypto or a seasoned trader, you can start trading quickly and confidently.
We support a wide range of major and trending tokens, including BTC (Bitcoin), ETH (Ethereum), BNB (Binance Coin), XRP (Ripple), ADA (Cardano), DOGE (Dogecoin), SOL (Solana), DOT (Polkadot), MATIC (Polygon), LTC (Litecoin), AVAX (Avalanche), LINK (Chainlink), UNI (Uniswap), BCH (Bitcoin Cash), XLM (Stellar), ATOM (Cosmos), ETC (Ethereum Classic), FIL (Filecoin), ICP (Internet Computer), TRX (TRON), NEAR (NEAR Protocol), ALGO (Algorand), VET (VeChain), MKR (Maker), AAVE (Aave), EOS, KSM (Kusama), XTZ (Tezos), THETA, ZEC (Zcash), and hundreds more.
No matter your style—spot or futures—you’ll find familiar assets and a smooth trading experience on bit.com.
C2C Cloud Mining
In April 2025, bit.com launched the industry’s first C2C cloud mining platform, allowing users to invest in BTC mining with low entry barriers. Miners can list their computing power, and users can purchase directly — with transparent pricing and daily settlements. No platform commission.
No middlemen = lower costs


Enforced fulfillment and 130% compensation guarantee


Supports major PoW coins: BTC, LTC, DOGE, BELLS, and more


On-Chain Asset Trading (GoRich)
No wallet, no private key required — seamlessly trade on-chain crypto assets directly within bit.com. Use USDT to buy trending on-chain tokens with the liquidity of a DEX and the ease of a CEX:
Limit orders, auto-matching, and automatic gas fee deduction


Cross-chain trading via a single account — no network switching


Crypto assets are securely custodied by Cactus Custody, a licensed custodian under Matrixport. All funds are fully transparent and traceable on-chain


What Can bit.com Offer You?
Whether you're buying your first crypto, exploring the hottest on-chain trends, or investing in mining yields, bit.com provides a clear, beginner-friendly path for all users — bridging the gap between centralized trading and on-chain crypto asset management.
Why Choose bit.com?
Secure and Trusted
We partner with Cautus Custody, a licensed custodian under Matrixport, to provide multi-layer asset segregation and real-time risk control. Since our launch in 2020, we’ve maintained five years of zero security incidents, helping you trade and invest with peace of mind.
Beginner-Friendly
No complex steps. No blockchain knowledge required. From buying crypto to trading futures and exploring on-chain crypto assets, our product design focuses on being clean, intuitive, and easy to use, so anyone can get started quickly.
Comprehensive Product Offering
bit.com supports a wide range of services in one place: spot, perpetuals, options, cloud mining, and on-chain asset trading — covering mainstream tokens like BTC, ETH, and trending new assets to meet the needs of every type of investor.
Regulatory Compliance
bit.com has operated legally and compliantly since day one. Our custody partners are fully licensed, ensuring a trusted environment for your digital asset journey. We’ve obtained a VASP license in Lithuania, received initial approval from Dubai’s VARA regulator, and are actively pursuing additional licenses in other jurisdictions.
bit.com is committed to building a safer, simpler, and more reliable investment experience — helping every user confidently step into the world of Web3.
descriptionShort: All-in-One Crypto Exchange Easy to Use — For Everyone

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: Fixed known bugs and enhanced user experience.

title:
BIT.com: Buy BTC & ETH 、Meme
2.0.12
